item.title: Powerful Daily Confession August 2021
item.description: Galatians 3:13-14 New International Version (NIV)"Christ redeemed us from the curse of the law by becoming a curse for us, for it is written: "Cursed is everyone who is hung on a pole. He redeemed us in order that the blessing given to Abraham might come to the Gentiles through Christ Jesus, so that by faith we might receive the promise of the Spirit." Ephesians 1:17-23 New International Version (NIV)"I keep asking that the God of our Lord Jesus Christ, the glorious Father, may give you the Spirit of wisdom and revelation, so that you may know him better. I pray that the eyes of your heart may be enlightened in order that you may know the hope to which he has called you, the riches of his glorious inheritance in his holy people, and his incomparably great power for us who believe. item.title: Blessed To Be Blessing
item.description: Ephesians 1:3 (NIV) "Praise be to the God and Father of our Lord Jesus Christ, who has blessed us in the heavenly realms with every spiritual blessing in Christ."How many of you have your bibles with you? Raise it high, kiss it and let's give glory to the almighty Father. Then make this declaration: You are blessed to be a blessingI am blessed to be a blessing. Thank God, we're blessed to be a blessing. Genesis 12:1-3 (NIV) "The Lord had said to Abram, "Go from your country, your people and your father's household to the land I will show you. item.title: Prayers for July
item.description: "Listen to my prayer, O God, do not ignore my plea; hear me and answer me. My thoughts trouble me and I am distraught. Evening, morning and noon.
